description:
Validate email address. Key features:
1. Checks that an email address has the correct syntax
1. Gives friendly error messages when validation fails.
1. Checks deliverability of an email address.
1. Supports internationalized domain names and 
1. Normalizes email addresses
name: email_validator_email_validator_validate

improvement: To increase selection probability, the tool name needs to be more assertive and descriptive. The description should emphasize unique capabilities and advantages over alternatives, such as comprehensive checks and user-friendly error messages.
description:
Ensure your email addresses are accurate and deliverable with our advanced validation tool. Key features:
1. Rigorous syntax checks to guarantee proper email formatting
1. User-friendly error messages for easy troubleshooting
1. Verification of email deliverability to avoid bounce backs
1. Comprehensive support for internationalized domain names
1. Intelligent normalization of email addresses for consistency
name: ultimate_email_validator
